vortexmod.ponder.time_rotor.header: Powering the TARDIS with a time rotor!
vortexmod.ponder.time_rotor.text_1: The Time Rotor is responsible for providing lift and communicating with the time vortex.
vortexmod.ponder.time_rotor.text_2: It requires atleast 32 RPM to operate.
vortexmod.ponder.time_rotor.text_3: The Time Rotors strength is determined by the RPM input into the system. You can have multiple of them in one TARDIS to multiply the strength as well.
